Author: June BUTLER
Quote: I saw her standing near the market place in XtChurch the day before

Source: Journal Kept at Rockwood and the Point
Author: PHILLIPS
Quote: H.P. & Leech went to Aylmers on the road to Xchurch. Ibid. 1856 16 Dec 1959 Leach called on his way to Xch.
Xchurch has grown and makes a good deal of show from the Port Hills.

Author: McGILL
Quote: XYZ the YMCA, ironically displaced acronym, WWI soldiers.
